question: The “Centre of Excellence in Blockchain Technology” is to be inaugurated in which Indian city?
explanation:
The Centre of Excellence (CoE) in Blockchain Technology, set up by the National Informatics Centre (NIC) in Bengaluru, Karnataka would be inaugurated by the Union Minister for Communication and Electronics & Information Technology, Ravi Shankar Prasad. 
The adoption of Block-chain Technology in sectors such as finance, agriculture, health etc would help the Government to implement its various programmes and preserve the associated data in a trustworthy manner. With the infrastructure facilities provided by NIC, the Centre of Excellence (CoE) will also provide Blockchain as a Service (BaaS) for efficient hosting of Block-chain network.
